faq.a:
The recording button is in the top left of the virtual classroom. It looks like this .
Click on the button to start the recording and click to stop the recording. You can do this multiple times and it will capture only what you choose to record.

faq.q: How can I track student views of sessions at Learn It Live and download info about the sessions?
faq.a:
1. Log into your account.
2. Click on "View Reports" on the left hand side bar on your profile.
You will see both recording and live views listed there.

faq.q: The commission and payment system explained
faq.a:
This article is regarding a la carte (individual) payments for classes over the platform. For compensation regarding the LiL+ Membership & Conscious Expert Collective, see this article.
 
The standard LiL commission is 15% for the Learn It Live platform.

faq.q: What happens if you go over your set class time? Does the classroom kick you out?
faq.a: No, it doesn't. The only thing is new people won't be able join as the Enter Live Session will deactivate after the scheduled period. Anyone in the classroom will stay in the classroom.

faq.q: How do I lead a private/coaching session, record a test class, or invite other people to practice with me in the virtual classroom?
faq.a:
The "Test Session" only allows one person to practice at a time and does NOT record. To have other people or record your class you will need to:
A) Create a Class 
B) Select Private in "Privacy Options" (and create an access code)
C) Schedule the class an

faq.q: What is the maximum number of simultaneously active microphones that can be on in my LiL session?
faq.a: There is technically no limit. However, we recommend only having people "live" on the microphone who are currently presenting to avoid any chance for audio disruption.

faq.q: What is the maximum number of simultaneously active video cameras that can be on in my session?
faq.a: There is technically no limit. However, we recommend only having as many webcams going as required at any given time.

faq.q: What's the Difference Between 'Free' and 'Free for Member' Classes?
faq.a: On our platform, Free classes are accessible by anyone, while Free for LiL+ Members are exclusively available to members.

faq.q: How is Free different from Free for Member?
faq.a: Free classes are open to everyone, whereas Free for LiL+ Member classes are a perk for LiL+ subscribers only.

faq.q: What's the distinction between Free and Free for Member?
faq.a: Free classes are open for all users, but Free for LiL+ Member classes are only available to LiL+ members.

faq.q: Could you explain the difference between Free and Free for Member?
faq.a: Regular free classes are open to everyone. Free for LiL+ Member classes require LiL+ membership.

faq.q: In simple terms, how do Free and Free for Member differ?
faq.a: Anyone can take Free classes, but Free for LiL+ Members classes are reserved for members.

faq.q: Free vs Free for Member - what's the difference?
faq.a: Free classes are available to all users, while Free for LiL+ Member classes are exclusive to LiL+ members.

faq.q: Can I View Prices in a Different Currency?
faq.a: Yes, select your preferred currency from the Language Menu at the top-right corner.

faq.q: Is it possible for me to view prices in a different currency?
faq.a: Yes, you can view prices in another currency via the Language Menu.

faq.q: I want to view prices in a different currency. Can I?
faq.a: Yes, simply select the currency from the Language Menu.

faq.q: Could I view prices in a different currency?
faq.a: Yes, you can choose the currency from the Language selector at the top of the website.

faq.q: Can LiL-T Tokens be used to register for classes?
faq.a: LiL-T Tokens are only for Reward Store classes and cannot be used for regular class registration.

faq.q: Can our team use LiL-T Tokens for class registrations?
faq.a: No, LiL-T Tokens are limited to Reward Store classes.

faq.q: We want to use LiL-T Tokens for classes. Possible?
faq.a: LiL-T Tokens are only valid in the Reward Store.

faq.q: Cannot be heard in the classroom?
faq.a: Select correct microphone, check browser permissions, or use dial-in provided.

faq.q: Background noise in the class
faq.a: Instructors should mute participants. Participants can mute themselves or use a headset.

faq.q: Audio worked initially but now it stopped.
faq.a: Refresh page, rejoin session, or check your device settings.

faq.q: Draft vs Scheduled Publishing?
faq.a: Draft keeps classes private. Scheduled Publishing sets automatic publication.

faq.q: How do I add/edit Program Tags?
faq.a: Use admin panel to manage program tags.

faq.q: How can I change my email address?
faq.a: Change your email in Account Settings and verify the new address.

faq.q: Official Invoice for Tax Purposes?
faq.a: Invoices are downloadable from your Purchase History or contact support.

faq.q: Switch student account to instructor?
faq.a: Apply via Instructor Application form and await approval.

faq.q: Arrange corporate/group programs?
faq.a: Contact partnerships team for tailored group programs.

faq.q: Toggle webcam/slides in recordings?
faq.a: Use toggle button in playback to switch views.

faq.q: I purchased a class but I can’t access it.

faq.q: I have two accounts set up under different emails, can I combine them into one.
faq.a: We can’t merge accounts, but we can move all your classes into one account so everything’s in one place. Please reach out to support@learnitlive.com

faq.q: Can I combine my two accounts into one?

faq.q: Where is the buy button?
faq.a: The Register Now button on the class page is the buy button. Click it to go to checkout and choose your payment method.

faq.q: What time will the class start in my time zone?
faq.a: Our platform automatically detects your local time zone, so all class times you see are already shown in your local time.

faq.q: Can I message all my learners at the same time?
faq.a:
Go to My Classes > Message All Learners or click your profile picture (upper right) > My Account > Message All Learners.
To message only the registrants of a specific class, go to that class page > Message Registrants.

faq.q: Is there a way to contact all class participants together?
faq.a:
Go to My Classes > Message All Learners or click your profile picture (upper right) > My Account > Message All Learners.
To message only the registrants of a specific class, go to that class page > Message Registrants.

faq.q: How do I send a message to everyone enrolled?
faq.a:
Go to My Classes > Message All Learners or click your profile picture (upper right) > My Account > Message All Learners.
To message only the registrants of a specific class, go to that class page > Message Registrants.

faq.q: How can I sign up for a class?
faq.a: Go to the class page and click Register Now, then follow the checkout process to complete your registration.

faq.q: Where do I go to register for a class?
